title: Every Which Way (Sloan Brothers) - Read, Calia
description:
Severine Blake has seen far too many friends taken down in
the crossfires of dating. She devises a precise course of action
to protect her heart. The plan is working very well...until she
meets Thayer and Macsen.

When the Sloan brothers come into her life, nothing is the same.

Thayer is self-possessed, arrogant and used to getting what he
wants. Being near him leaves Severine unsteady and shaken.
He makes her question everything.

Macsen contradicts his brother in every way. His calm personality
captivates her. Severine is drawn to him instantly.

But Severine quickly discovers that when you want something, that
want can turn wicked. Giving in is not always easy, especially when
your heart refuses to give up the fight.

What little illusion of love Severine has is soon destroyed. Every
option is broken, and the protection she has built around her heart
instantly crumbles.

There's just no right way with the Sloan brothers.



Every Which Way
By: Read, Calia
Pages: EPUB 599 - PDF 1024
Language: EN
